channel.description: Appendix D: Sample RHCSA Exam 4 (Using server1 and server2) Setup for Sample Exam 4: Build two virtual machines with RHEL 9 Server with GUI (Exercises 1-1 and 1-2). Use a 20GB disk for the OS with default partitioning. Add 1x5GB disk to VM2 and a network interface to both virtual machines. Do not configure the network interfaces or create a normal user account during installation. Tasks: Task 01: On VM1, set the system hostname to rhcsa5.example.com and alias rhcsa5 using the hostnamectl command. Make sure that the new hostname is reflected in the command prompt. (Exercises 15-1 and 15-5). *done
